wordGroup: sun visor n. （车辆驾驶室挡风玻璃上的）防晒板

sentences.en: He pulled on a battered old crash helmet with a scratched visor.
sentences.cn: 他戴上了一顶破旧的、面罩上已有划痕的防护头盔。

sentences.en: Oxygen is circulated around the helmet to stop the visor misting.
sentences.cn: 头盔内有氧气循环流动，除了供氧，还可以防止面罩雾化。
